author: Charles Darwin
text: It is not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent that survives. It is the one that is most adaptable to change.

author: Richard Matheson
text: I am the last man on Earth, but I am not alone.

author: Cormac McCarthy
text: Maybe this is how it was always supposed to end.

author: The Book of Eli
text: The world has been broken. We're the last choking embers of a fire waiting to burn out. Long shadows have been cast across the pages of our history.

author: John Christopher
text: It's not the end of the world at all. It's only the end for us. The world will go on just the same, only we shan't be in it.
